meta.notes: This file is for testing. Edit start and end times to control when messages appear.

messages.title: Dashboard Test Message
messages.body: This is a custom message loaded from JSON. It should render in the summary panel and trigger a toast and browser notification if enabled.

messages.title: Comms Reminder
messages.body: If you are using this dashboard for an event, confirm the public message on the home page is current.

messages.title: Scheduled Test Message
messages.body: This message is in the future so it should not show yet. Change the start time to test scheduling.

messages.title: Disabled Message
messages.body: This should never show because enabled is false.
